nodes.text: Gorn Vorrox was a male Duros merchant during the Galactic Civil War. He traded in information and stolen goods in the seedy Seelom District of Jyvus City, the largest space city in orbit over Duro. Vorrox owned Gorn's Emporium which appeared to be little more than a junk shop, but truly dealt in illicit and exotic weapons and merchandise.
Gorn Vorrox was a friendly sort to all outward appearances, but in reality he was an opportunistic con artist, as well as a skilled negotiator and shrewd salesperson.
